feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Linking Outgoing Check Information to Journal Entry Items for PDF Preview in Create Correspondence
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

Is there a way to access or fill data in the Journal Entry XML data source (from either Ledger or Entry)?

Here’s what I’m trying to do:
I create a Vendor Payment using Post Outgoing Payments. After that, it links to Manage Outgoing Checks, where the PaymentDocuement is connected to the AccountingDocument from the Journal Entry created during posting.

I want to know if it’s possible to automatically copy the check number from the Outgoing Check to the Journal Entry Item. Once that value is available, I’ll use it to preview the PDF in Manage Journal Entries (Document Type “KZ”) and then click Create Correspondence to view the PDF report.

Best regards,
Oliver

entry.title: Validation and set creation
entry.content:
Hi,


I need assistance with three related configuration tasks.


We need to define a new custom message to be used within our validation rules. How I can make it?

We need to implement a validation rule when there is the control that the posting date of a document mustn’t greater than the acquition date. How I can make it?

We need to define  Sets to manage dynamic value lists and assign them within the validation rules. How I can make it?

Thanks.

entry.title: Issue with Download Template Functionality in RAP-Based Mass Upload Table (ADT)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I’ve implemented a table with a mass upload feature, but the “Download Template” option isn’t working as expected.

I created an abstract entity with a rawstring data type and additional parameters to accept the attachment. In the behavior definition, I’ve defined a static action to generate the Excel file and assign it to the result. However, while I can successfully upload the template using similar approach, the download functionality doesn’t trigger, and no errors are shown.

Please find the screenshot below for your reference.
Could you please review my approach and let me know if I’m missing something or if any changes are required?

Abstract entity:

Behavior definition and implementing class:

Thank you in Advance.

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition ABAP RESTful Application Programming Model  SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition Research and Development ABAP Development

entry.title: How to enable access to the Request URI field in the OData Error Log app (view-only role)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,
 
(SAP Public Cloud, 3SL CBC)
 
In our SAP test environment, I’m trying to grant a colleague access to view the Request URI field within the OData Error Log app. Currently, the field shows the message:
 /sap/opu/odata/sap/***No_authority_to_see_detail*** 
 
We have a dedicated role that provides view-only access to audit and log information. My goal is to adjust this role so that the colleague can read the Request URI field without granting any additional administrative permissions.
 
Dedicated role:
Global Administrator:
 
What I’ve done so far:
• Added the relevant Business Catalogs to allow access to the app and system.
• However, the role is still not authorised to see the Request URI field.
 
What I need help with:
• Which specific business catalog(s) or authorisation objects are required to make the Request URI field visible in the OData Error Log app.
 
Any insights or guidance would be greatly appreciated!
 
Thank you in advance,
Sjoerd

entry.title: System doesnt calculate safety stock or MAD (Mean Absolute Deviation) in automatic reorder point
entry.content:
Hi All, I’m using MRP type V2 (Automatic Reorder Point Planning) with automatic calculation of both reorder point and safety stock based on consumption history in SAP S4 HANA public cloud.

Issue:
When I run the forecast, the system calculates the reorder point, but it does not calculate safety stock or MAD (Mean Absolute Deviation). I’ve checked the configuration for the MRP type, and it includes both reorder point and safety stock.

Details:

  • MRP Type: V2
  • Lot Size: EX
  • Service Level: 99.9%
  • Planned Delivery Time: 4 days
  • Forecast Model: Constant
  • Forecast Period: Monthly

Question:
Am I missing any configuration or step that would enable the system to calculate safety stock and MAD during forecasting?

entry.title: No safety stock or MAD is caculated but reorder point in automatic reorder point
entry.content:
Hi All,

 

Im using MRP type V2 (Automatic Reorder Point Planning) with automatic calculation of both reorder point and safety stock based on consumption history in SAP S4 HANA public cloud.

Issue:
When I run the forecast, the system calculates the reorder point, but it does not calculate safety stock or MAD (Mean Absolute Deviation). I’ve checked the configuration for the MRP type, and it includes both reorder point and safety stock.

Details:

  • MRP Type: V2
  • Lot Size: EX
  • Service Level: 99.9%
  • Planned Delivery Time: 4 days
  • Forecast Model: Constant
  • Forecast Period: Monthly

Question:
Am I missing any configuration or step that would enable the system to calculate safety stock and MAD during forecasting?

Thanks

entry.title: tolerance set for supplier invoice amounts
entry.content:

Could you tell me how to make it so that an error occurs?

entry.title: Unable to Get Sales Order number which are failed in Schedule Delivery Creation JOB

Dinesh Sahoo

entry.title: How to add output tax line item in customer master data
entry.content:
Dear colleague,

I need add one line item in customer master data for country CN and tax condition type ZTX1

I have created the condition type ZTX1 copied from TTX1 via SSCUI 101120

And I also configure the SSCUI: 106589 Maintain Tax Relevance for Customers

But still can't edit in customer master data, what else did I miss...could you help to support it?

Many thanks,

Chen

entry.title: FI_OT_DNC001 message
entry.content:
Hi,

when I enter a posting date later than today's date, I get the message FI_OT_DNC001, which I've attached. However, it doesn't appear on another customer, and I'd like this message to appear for that customer as well. How can I do this?

Thanks.

entry.title: New MRP Controller values invisible on Planned Orders apps
entry.content:
Hello Community,

I have created specific MRP Controllers in the system.

I can assign them to Materials in the Plant node, for planning purpose.

However, when using apps related to Planned Orders such as Manage Planned Orders or Convert Planned Orders, I can only see in the filter the SAP standard Values :

Also, Planned Orders (that do exist) are no listed either which is even more annoying.

Only the Collective Conversion app will let me see them.

Anything I might have missed in the configuration or is it a system issue?

Many thanks for your insights.

entry.title: S/4 Hana public cloud - Key User - Create Custom Tile with Custom CDS view
entry.content:
Hi all,

I need to create a custom Tile using my custom CDS created in Key user mode using the app Custom Cds View.

I found a temporary solution, create tile using the URL of Custom data browser for my CDS, but it's not dynamic  ( DEV, TEST, PROD) for each system.

There is a correct procedure to expose my CDS view using a Custom Tile?

thanks,

entry.title: IT_VAT_REGISTER report
entry.content:
Hi,

 

In the “Manage your solution” App, I see IT_VAT_REGISTER report,

but in the “Run Statutory Reports”, I see only IT_VAT_DCL report.

How I can do for show also the IT_VAT_REGISTER report?


Thanks

entry.title: How to configure automatic G/L account selection for outgoing payments in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud,
entry.content:
When posting outgoing or incoming payments, after i choose bank account, there's the option to also select the GL account. Kindly find attached the screenshot. How do i configure the system to automatically choose outgoing payment GL when its an outgoing payment and incoming payment GL when its an incoming payment. I dont want to have to manually input this when creating payment.

Please note that i have created the reconciliation GL and have maintained the two subaccounts. I have also connected the reconciliation GL to the bank account.
